transcript: You're the one who probably wishes to see with someone else, someone who you have to enjoy yourself and didn't take everything so hard.

segments.text: You're the one who probably wishes to see with someone else, someone who you have to enjoy yourself and didn't take everything so hard.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You're the one who probably wishes you were with someone else.  Someone who--you'd rather enjoy yourself and didn't take everything so hard.
